issue.title: Problem in metadata replication modal window
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

2 problems when trying to replicate a metadata :

- the option "last" doesn't return only the last but all the metadata
- when selecting a huge number of records(100) to be displayed, the modal window is not scrollable and the button "Import" is not accessible.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.3
